Alchemist.name: Alchemist
Alchemist.starting_gold: 3d6 × 10 gp (average 105gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

levels.special: Alchemy, bomb 1d6, brew potion, mutagen, throw anything

Antipaladin.name: Antipaladin
Antipaladin.starting_gold: 5d6 × 10 gp (average 175 gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

levels.special: Aura of evil, detect good, smite good 1/day
Aura of cowardice, cruelty, plague bringer

Barbarian.name: Barbarian
Barbarian.starting_gold: 3d6 × 10 gp (average 105gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

Bard.name: Bard
Bard.starting_gold: 3d6 × 10 gp (average 105 gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

levels.special: Bardic knowledge, bardic performance, cantrips, countersong, distraction, fascinate, inspire courage +1
Inspire competence +4, inspire courage +3, lore master 2/day

Cavalier.name: Cavalier
Cavalier.starting_gold: 5d6 × 10 gp (average 175gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

Cleric.name: Cleric
Cleric.alignment: A cleric's alignment must be within one step of her deity's, along either the law/chaos axis or the good/evil axis.
Cleric.starting_gold: 4d6 × 10 gp (average 140 gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

levels.special: Aura, channel energy 1d6, domains, orisons, spontaneous casting

Druid.name: Druid
Druid.starting_gold: 2d6 × 10 gp (average 70 gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

levels.special: Nature bond, nature sense, orisons, wild empathy

Fighter.name: Fighter
Fighter.starting_gold: 5d6 x 10 gp (average 175gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

Gunslinger.name: Gunslinger
Gunslinger.starting_gold: 5d6 x 10 gp (average 175gp) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less, and the gunslinger begins with her starting firearm.

Inquisitor.name: Inquisitor
Inquisitor.alignment: An inquisitor's alignment must be within one step of her deity's, along either the law/chaos axis or the good/evil axis.
Inquisitor.starting_gold: 4d6 × 10 gp (average 140gp.) In addition, each character begins play with an outfit worth 10 gp or less.

levels.special: Domain, judgment 1/day, monster lore, orisons, stern gaze

Bonus feat, Ki pool (lawful), slow fall 50 ft.
Timeless body, tongue of the sun and moon
Perfect self, slow fall any distance
